title: [Client] Champ Select Rune Bug
body: Sometimes in champ select I won't be able to change my runes. Not sure how or why it happens but restarting client usually fixes it for a while until it happens again.

replies.body: Please look into this Riot, this keeps happening!
It has been happening to me lately as well
that me right there. Im with you that what happen to me
Please fix this riot, been going on for months, far out
Got this all 3 games of clash..

10 year game
and I can't even pick runes
more than 10 times to me here...!

>
> 10 year game

Man i have a tough time even logging in now
Same, it's almost made me lose games but I can still pick out default pages if needed.
Just happened to me i got wrong runes on a ranked game and my team flames me lmao. Riot do something
This has been happening to me recently as well, quite often
Riot, it's been 3 months since the problem has been reported and you still did nothing ? it just happened to me, can you fix this pls ? i had to dodge the ranked game for no reason
OMG i thought i was the only one getting this.
happpens to me often, FIX PLZ RIOT!!!
This just happened to me in clash...
Yep this is a real problem has happen more than 5 times
